text: 3LW (Three Little Women) was an American girl group. The group members were Naturi Cora Maria Naughton, Adrienne Eliza Bailon, and Kiely Alexis Williams. The band was formed in 1999 in Newark, New Jersey. In August 2002, Naughton announced that she had been forced out of 3LW. Before the year's end, the group held various auditions in Atlanta, Los Angeles and New York in search of a third member. Jessica Benson was chosen. She joined 3LW in December. The group ended in 2006. == Members == * Adrienne Bailon - born Adrienne Eliza Bailon on October 24, 1983, Manhattan, New York, U.S. * Kiely Williams - born Kiely Alexis Williams on July 9, 1986, Alexandria, Virginia, United States * Naturi Naughton - born Naturi Cora Maria Naughton on May 20, 1984, East Orange, New Jersey * Jessica Benson - born in 1988, Severn, Maryland ==Discography== ;Studio albums * 2000: 3LW * 2002: A Girl Can Mack * 2002: Naughty or Nice * 2022: Point of No Return ;Other albums * 2005: Neva Get Enuf ==Awards and nominations== Year Award 2001 Soul Train Music Award Win for "Best New R&B; or Hip-Hop Artist" Soul Train Music Award Win for "Album of the Year" BET Award Nominated for Best Female Group 2002 BET Award Nominated for Best Female Group 2003 BET Award Nominated for Best Female Group ==Other websites== * Official site * Myspace * Discogs Category:1999 establishments in the United States Category:1990s American music groups Category:2000s American music groups Category:2007 disestablishments in the United States Category:American girl groups Category:American R&B; bands Category:American hip hop bands Category:American soul bands Category:American dance musicians Category:Musical groups established in 1999 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2007 Category:Musical groups from New Jersey Category:Newark, New Jersey Category:1990s establishments in New Jersey
title: 3LW
